channel.title: What keeps you motivated?
channel.description:
This is something I've always wanted to know. I like to develop servers and see where they take me, but I've gotten bored of em. Everything I want to do, has been done, or is being done. I don't want to be a person that looks like they are copying another person. I understand that we're taking off RuneScape, which had seen its better years. But still, these servers are just getting worse because not all of us (me included) know how to program them correctly, and learn off already bad bases.
Anyways, I want to know, what keeps you all motivated to keep working on a private server?

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:7, topic:477426”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=595619.msg4193659#msg4193659 date=1357190377]
Hopefully I can do services or something to get money.
[/quote]

Do Client-sided work. It’s easy and people pay an unreasonable amount of money for very little content.[/quote]
Mainly because they find obfuscated code impossible to work with

Read full topic

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Clawz fury:

Hopefully I can do services or something to get money.

Do Client-sided work. It’s easy and people pay an unreasonable amount of money for very little content.

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Zombie rsps? Like Nazi-Zombies?

Not quite, but kind of. It would be really fun to make and I have so many ideas for it.

Read full topic

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Clawz fury:

i want to make a loveing zombie rsps, and host it. I’ve wanted to do this since I first came to the rsps scene. I finally have enough knowledge to make it a reality but my finances are holding me back. Hopefully I can do services or something to get money.

Zombie rsps? Like Nazi-Zombies?

Read full topic

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

i want to make a fucking zombie rsps, and host it. I’ve wanted to do this since I first came to the rsps scene. I finally have enough knowledge to make it a reality but my finances are holding me back. Hopefully I can do services or something to get money.

Read full topic

item.title: What keeps you motivated?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Nothing motivates me or makes me want to work with R.S.P.S. anymore. I’ve exhausted all of my motivational resources to the point to where they become discouraging instead of encouraging.

I started around when allstar was the top dog. Now, I don’t care for customs, and I can see allstar is crap. But I don’t see a point in moving forward…

Read full topic
